sentences.en: She began to berate the police for paying scant attention to the theft from her car.
sentences.cn: 她开始严厉斥责警方对她车内东西失窃一案关注不足。

sentences.en: It has become commonplace to berate Mr Bush for "losing" Latin America.
sentences.cn: 抨击布什先生“丢掉”拉美的话已如同家常便饭一般。

sentences.en: Officials now regularly berate insurers, a sure-fire way to win populist points.
sentences.cn: 官员们现在动辄责骂保险公司，这是一种赢得公众支持的稳操胜券的方式。
